name: Lava Labyrinth (Game Jam version)
description:
Welcome to Lava Labyrinth!

-----------------------------------------

This was made for Ludum dare 47. Hope you all enjoy it! :)

-----------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS:

Your goal is to get out of this Lava Filled maze by looping certain instructions you give.

Reach the checkpoint to progress to the next level.

You will not be able to go through walls and the instruction you gave will be skipped. For example, it there is a wall in front of you and you have chosen the instruction to go forward, it will be skipped and will carry on with the next instruction

-----------------------------------------

It is a bit short because it was made within 2 days and also because my exams were going on at that moment (so I had to submit quickly)

However, I will release a full version so that you guys can have a more fun-filled puzzle experience

----------------------------------------

CREDITS:
